document_data.name: Uruma
document_data.mainbody: '''Uruma''' was the [[Wa-an dictionary#O|''oyabun'']] of the [[Worthless Flower]] [[yakuza]] gang in [[Nakamaru]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Uruma directed all the operations of his gang from his veranda. Thanks to his prized ''[[cap of telepathy]]'', his underlings never knew when he saw inside their minds and what operations were underway, so they depended heavily on Uruma.
document_data.History: Uruma was targeted by the [[tigbanua buso]] [[Getsu]] as the perfect vessel to spread his infection.
document_data.Personality: Uruma's shrewd brain compensated for the weakness of his old body. However, he was still capable of fighting.
